alert.note: Alert for Howard; Sherman (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 5:18PM CDT until July 23 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Sherman County in central Nebraska... Western Howard County in central Nebraska... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 518 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Rockville, or 31 miles northwest of Grand Island, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Ashton around 535 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Farwell. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
